sentence.Network_en: A certain partner, competitor, or detractor is due to be unpredictable and challenging.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个合作伙伴 、 竞争对手或者小人会在当天不可预料地给你带来麻烦.

PerfectNetExp.abs: LSAT红宝书1 - 豆丁网 ... detract 转移 detractor 诽谤者,恶意批评者 detriment 损害,损害物.
然而，今天情况不同了，出现了自由软件的诋毁者（detractors）和变节者(defectors)。当今，只有少数GNU/Linux发行版不包含私有 …
大红宝书的单词记忆法总体感觉还是不错的,比如:detractor(贬低者),de+tract(拉)+or->向下拉的人->贬低者; distracted(心烦意乱的),dis+tract(拉)+ed->(.

list.abs: But the law has many detractors ., 但是这部法律也有很多的诋毁者.
Many of Hamilton ' s detractors sensed a conspiracy , venting their anger at 27 - year - old Glock ., 许多汉密尔顿的诋毁遥感阴谋 , 发泄他们的愤怒在 27 岁的格洛克.
alacrityreluctant乐意，欣然忧郁，不情愿apologist detractor辩护者诽谤者consciousunwitting 有意识的无意识的
some of France's detractors worry that this is less helpful than focussing on the boring but necessary things that make a G20 presidency successful .一些法国的批评人士担心与其这样，还不如着眼于那些更有助于顺利完成G20主席国任期的枯燥却必要的事务。

entry.def: The detractors of a person or thing are people who criticize that person or thing.

example.ex: This performance will silence many of his detractors...
example.tran: 这一表演将会让很多诋毁他的人闭嘴。

example.ex: The news will have delighted detractors of the scheme.
example.tran: 这条消息会让该方案的批评者感到高兴。

means.word_mean: 1. one who disparages or belittles the worth of something

auth_sentence.content: For every detractor, there was a defender.
auth_sentence.res_content: For every detractor, there was a defender.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For every detractor, there was a defender.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their actions determine whether a customer becomes a brand evangelist or detractor.

auth_sentence.content: The most obvious detractor to this study is the fact that an individual's physical appearance varies depending upon many factors.
auth_sentence.res_content: The most obvious detractor to this study is the fact that an individual's physical appearance varies depending upon many factors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The most obvious detractor to this study is the fact that an individual's physical appearance varies depending upon many factors.

sentences.en: She put up a game fight against her detractors.
sentences.cn: 她勇敢对抗那些诽谤她的人。
